name: PaintPool
description:
Paintpool is your imaginary pool game but it's played with a small ball and the goal is to break the paint blocks and release the paint!

In this game you have 20 levels that are different stages for your ball to achieve the level's goal. The ball must end up in the finish area and a player has just a number of moves to do so. Some levels have more moves allowed and some less. That depends on the level difficulty and on the number of obstacles on the way to the goal block.

Combine the moves and plan the line of strike to pass all the levels. Good luck!
